channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Pak for Automation

item.title: CVE-2021-20359|2024-09-17T01:26:20.855Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20automation
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Automation 20.0.3, 20.0.2-IF002 - Business Automation Application Designer Component stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be obtained by an unauthorized user. IBM X-Force ID: 194966.

item.title: CVE-2021-38966|2024-09-17T01:12:18.333Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20automation
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Automation 21.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 212357.

item.title: CVE-2021-38893|2024-09-17T00:26:52.814Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20automation
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 and IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0 and 21.0 are vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209512.
